item.description: Business categories Jeff Bezos - Amazon - online retail Bill Gates - Microsoft - computer software and solutions Warren Buffett - Investor, Aquisitions of other companies Bernard Arnault & Family - Louis Vuitton and Sephora Carlos Slim Helu & Family - Telecom, construction, consumer goods, real estate Amancio Ortega - Zara - clothing retail Larry Ellison - Oracle, Hydroponics, Tesla Mark Zuckerberg - facebook (online address book) Michael Bloomberg - bloomberg (financial news and media) Larry Page - Google Chalres Koch -Crude Oil, Fertilizer, Chemicals, Homegoods David Koch - Crude Oil, Fertilizer, Chemicals, Homegoods Mukesh Ambani - Gas& Oil, Telecom Sergy Brin - Google Francoise Bettencourt Meyers & Family - L’Oreal Jim Walton - Walmart and Arvest Bank Alice Walton - Walmart Rob Walton - Walmart Steve Ballmer - Microsoft and NBA LA Clippers Ma Huateng - TECENT (mobile messaging) Jack Ma - Alibaba (online retail, mobil payments) Hui Ka Yan - Real Estate Development Karl Albrecht Jr.
